text: وَيَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوۡهُ دَٰخِرِينَ
translation: Guyyaa garrii (xurumbaa) keessa afuufamu wantoonni samii keessa jiranuufi dechii keessa jiran hunduu wantoota Rabbiin fedhe malee yeroo isaan rifatan [wanta ta’u yaadadhu] Hundumtuu salphatoo ta’anii gara Isaa (Rabbii) dhufan.
